1366849491647803395.text: Local election officials, coupled with state elected public servants, are closest to the people. These officials are charged with ensuring free, fair, and open elections. For decades, AR’s elections have been carried out without significant incident(s).

1366849490834120705.text: H.R. 1 is one of the most significant power grabs ever attempted in this country. Federalizing elections takes authority away from The People and holds it hostage in a centralized location… Washington, D.C. Hungry for power and having a taste, Democrats are ravenous for more.

1366849489995239431.text: Some parting thoughts and conclusions… America has always been the home of free, fair, and open elections. Governance by the will of the people has always been the fabric of our country and that of any free society. Our voices - YOUR voice - is the ultimate check on power.

1366849489101848579.text: FACT – H.R. 1 creates a “Speech Czar” at the Federal Election Commission - they will monitor what is being said on campaigns/political activities. The Constitution, as far as I am concerned, governs our speech, not some unelected despot. This is disgusting and hyper-partisan.

1366849488095166468.text: FACT – Voter registration is critical to election integrity. In AR, we have transparent/fair voter registration laws. H.R. 1 eliminates AR laws, replaces them w/ a fed voter reg. standard. Why replace state laws with a new fed standard that will likely result in fraud/bad actors?

1366849487180861441.text: FACT – Some states have ballot harvesting – a questionable tactic many deploy post Election Day, to “find” ballots counted for a race. H.R. 1 expands/legalizes this for every state. CA, NY, and a few other states are already old pros at harvesting (and I don’t mean the ag kind).

1366849486308454401.text: FACT – Many states changed voting structure/procedures for a once-in-a-lifetime pandemic. Some of those changes probably should not be permanent and could open doors for bad actors/fraud. H.R. 1 will expand and make permanent those changes, in *every* state

1366849485498970112.text: FACT – H.R. 1 takes money and contributes it directly to federal candidates and their campaigns. You may not agree with any single issue they are advocating – but that’s irrelevant. It goes to them, regardless.🤦‍♂️

1366849484379074560.text: FACT – H.R. 1 takes your hard-earned money and gives it to someone else to use for campaign contributions for *any* candidates they choose. It really doesn’t make sense for your money to be used for someone else to donate to a candidate, does it?

1246156629852205061.text: (4/5) The Office of Special Insp. General for Pandemic Recovery is tasked with conducting, supervising, and coordinating audits and investigations of the making, purchase, management, and sale of loans, loan guarantees and other investments made by the Secretary of the Treasury.

1246156629088837633.text: (3/5) The Pandemic Response Accountability Committee has expansive responsibility and enforcement powers and operates in conjunction with all federal inspectors general.  DOD IG Glenn Fine will chair this committee.

1246156620964511747.text: (2/5) Indeed, the CARES Act set up 3 parts: 1) Pandemic Response Accountability Comm., 2) Office of Special IG for Pandemic Recovery, and 3) the Congressional Oversight Commission.  These are in addition to the standing congressional oversight committees that are always active.

With another Congress almost behind us, I’ve been reflecting on some of my numbers from the 115th Congress: 
🤝 299 meetings 
🚙 86,076 miles driven

1055488516615036929.text: These men and women are absolute experts and are who we want at these scenes/in these situations when called for. They are going to be able to assist any/all law enforcement agencies with granular data to catch the person(s) who have done this

1055488515771940865.text: It is my hope that when things like this happen, we will remember those who get these calls, that they are heading full steam ahead to the threat, hoping to render it inert, diffuse it, or, if called for, detonate without any possible collateral damage.

1055488514698215425.text: May be dealing with.  They can also put on significant protective gear to guard themselves against a blast that would otherwise harm or potentially cause fatal injuries (see my previous tweets for pictures of these two examples)

1055488513804828678.text: Depending on the description of the device and even if there isn’t much of a description, they can now deploy robotic equipment that can go inside to a scene/location and provide live video of what they...

1055488512806567941.text: These experts who get these calls have a multitude of tools and resources now to assess the scene/device, more so than when I would join local law enforcement many years ago. We would have to get "eyes" on it directly to proceed

1055488511904759808.text: We had to do all we could to ensure the least amount of harm possible to civilians and our unit as we assessed the device and what needed to be done. Initial Success, or Total Failure

1055488511049195526.text: When I got called for different circumstances/situations, we had to determine what kind of device we were dealing with, its potential for harm, and how to secure the area around the device/munition

1055488510197723136.text: There is no consideration for any other factor when they get the call about a device other than to determine what they are dealing with and what the immediate next steps should be to prevent harm/injuries

1055488509321113602.text: The slogan we operated by in my unit was “Initial Success or Total Failure” and that is exactly what these individuals think of when they get the call of an IED/or explosive device

1055488508394176518.text: Quite literally – they are trained to handle a bomb of ANY kind and what to do with that device in the circumstances that they find it in and determine what to do accordingly

1055488507379093504.text: All of these men and women who are a part of the bomb squads/bomb disposal units who get these calls are some of the best trained and are experts in how to handle a bomb of any kind, in any situation
